resources.string: Choose a category that best matches the nature of your business.

When you press confirm, I’ll take you to business setup form to fill your business info.
This information will be used to set up\nyour business profile across all channels.
Creating a business website for you
Select an appropriate address for your new business website. You can always map an existing domain or a new domain at a later point.

business is successfully setup on Boost.
It’s time to start creating engaging and meaningfull content to make people aware about business. Content plays a vital role into giving strength to your business digitally.
Is there a WhatsApp number for your business?
In case you don’t have it, you can use your personal WhatsApp contact number to allow customers to start chatting with you directly on WhatsApp.
Setting up your business on Boost...
Setting up your digital channels on Boost...
Your business information setup is completed!
Your digital channels information setup is completed!
If you don\'t have a Facebook page for your business, or if you want to connect it later, please tap \'Skip\'
Do you have your business listed on Google Maps?
Even if your business does’t have a GMB profile or it is not listed on Google maps yet, we’ll help you create one. Simply tap on ‘Sync my GMB profile’ and we’ll take you through it.
Have you already enabled the shop section on your Facebook page?
If you don’t have a ‘Shop’ section on your Facebook Page or if you want to connect it later, please tap ‘Skip’.
Yes, Sync my Fb Page shop
If you don’t have a Twitter account for your business, or if you want to connect it later; please tap \'Skip\'.
Using Boost, you can now communicate with your followers on Twitter to build brand awareness and reach out to new customers.
Using Boost, you can now directly communicate with your customers on Google and reach out to more potential users.
Using Boost, you can now directly communicate with your customers on Facebook and reach out to more potential users.
Using Boost, all your products and services will start appearing in the Facebook Marketplace, allowing many more potential customers to discover your business and buy your products.
When you press confirm, I’ll take you to business setup form to fill your business info.
Please select relevant channels or remove unwanted channels to adjust your content’s reach.
Setting up your new business website...
• Registering business name…\n• Adding business contact…\n• Setting up a new business website…
Your business information is getting synced on below channels.
Building a digital growth plan for your business…
Note: The Names and Logos of Google Search, Google Maps, Facebook Page, Facebook Shop, WhatsApp Business & Twitter belong to their respective owners. Boost 360 does not own them.
In case you need any help,
Allow Boost to send entransactional updates regarding you orders, invoices along with other promotional messages on this WhatsApp number.

Unfortunately, This functionality is not available on the Android app yet. To activate this channel, please log in to boost the web portal (boost.nowfloats.com) from the nearest desktop and go to Content > Content Sharing Settings. There you\'ll be able to activate this.
Don’t worry, we’ll help you list your business on ‘Google My Business’ as well as on Google Maps. Simply click on ‘Create GMB Listing’ button to get started.
